snippet: Taking extensive measures to color gray hair allows more time for discussion on when to allow it to stay naturally gray.
abstract: Susan Dominus The Mirror column describes her mixed feelings about coloring her gray hair; argues that it only tells viewers that she is someone who is unwilling and unready to give in to physical symbols of age, which is its own social signaling.
lead_paragraph: Taking extensive measures to color gray hair allows more time for discussion on when to allow it to stay naturally gray.

headline.seo: Fears of Aging Color the Discussion of Gray Hair
headline.main: Fears of Aging Color the Discussion of Gray Hair
